text: Ne ni wina omubii omukhongo okhushila ulia owitsulisibungwa tsinyaali tsia Nyasaye wuwe mana nalatsibukulila oluchendo mana niyebilila akemikhono chichie chiaranjilisia. (bilishinga) toto efwe khwara mumioyo chiabu ebifunikho kho bakhaye okhumanya, (bilishinga) efwe khwara mumarwi kabu obusiro. Ne nobalanga khubulunjifu shibakhachama okhulunjikha tawe
